answerText: Julia Alvarez[10] Julia Alvarez hails from this Caribbean country whose literary output also includes the author of The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao, Junot Diaz. In the Time of the Butterflies is set during the rule of its dictator Rafael Trujillo.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 8 | 19 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author's poem "By Accident" tells of how her sisters were more concerned with "hairdryers and boys" than with poetry when she was growing up. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author of the poetry collections The Woman I Kept to Myself and Homecoming. She also wrote a novel about the Mirabal sisters entitled In the Time of the Butterflies.
